reviewText: We borrowed this from the library as we are going to Peru in a few weeks. This seriously had the production values of a home movie, and was about as interesting. Please don't spend money on it! It was nice to see the scenery and so on, but while the description says "learn how they make dye" you get a few minutes of shaky hand-held video of a villager doing "something" with some wool. And so it goes.
